separator.string: Have they experienced a similar situation in their life?
Would the audience like to change the story line or ending of the film? How and why?
Which character in the film did the audience like and relate to the most? Why?
Did they dislike anything about the film?
What were the different learnings / understanding of the student?
Did they enjoy doing the workbook activities?
Which activities in the workbook did they enjoy the most? Name a few they found meaningful and insightful
Is there any workbook activity that they did not like and why?
